article_title: As Obamacare Looms, Insurers Look Beyond Fee-For-Service Medicine, Say Execs At Forbes Healthcare Summit 2013

article_metadata.description: Executives from UnitedHealth Group, Humana and several Blue Cross and Blue Shield plans say they are rapidly moving toward transparency and away from paying doctors and hospitals on a fee-for-service basis, four insurance executives said at Forbes Healthcare Summit 2013. (Image credit: Getty Images via @daylife) The nation’s largest health plans [...]
article_metadata.author: Bruce Japsen
